body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to ABC Car Dealership. My name is Donald Bell. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Joan. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it is five five five, four eight nine, two three one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is jwright@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Joan. Is there anything specific you are looking for today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm just browsing but I'm happy with the service so far.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Joan. Thank you for your time. If you need any assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
